oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-06-07 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 7, 1958. Featuring Ott Devine (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performer Don Gibson, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 974th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Don Gibson; Stringbean; Hawkshaw Hawkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Hawkshaw Hawkins, Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Don Gibson -- I Can't Stop Loving You (Don Gibson) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Stringbean -- Nine Pound Hammer (Stringbean) -- Ott Devine and Hawkshaw Hawkins announce his tour schedule -- Hawkshaw Hawkins talks -- I Don't Apologize For Loving You (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements -- Noel Hotel commercial (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Cutrer, T. Tommy; Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003
